title: Honey soy ginger stir fry sauce
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons soy sauce', '5 tablespoons rice wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon chilli oil', '3 tablespoons grated root ginger', '1 teaspoon chilli garlic paste', '2 tablespoons honey', '60ml chicken or vegetable stock', '1 tablespoon cornflour']
